name: Arrow man (caprog)
description:
A Sokoban history on UTF-8 <3

State: in developement

Controls

  • Press "arrows" to move
  • Press "enter" for restart in Game Over screen

Changelog

  • V.0.4.0 Add all empty rooms
  • V.0.3.1 Bug fixing on keyboards actions
  • V.0.3.0 Add basic gamepad support on smartphone/tablet devices 
  • V.0.2.0  Add elapsed time, Game Over Screen and star collecting
  • V.0.1.1  Display room name
  • V.0.1.0  Add scene transition, rollback objects on the scene, box used to fill the empty floor, fix window scroll on arrow key down
  • V.0.0.0  Add first room, player move, box move, take key and open door
